title: Xin Zhao needs a horse
body: You see Xin Zhao's skins with horses sometimes, I think xin zhao deserves a horse. Give him a horse for his legendary! What say you?!

replies.body: Dude.  I love the idea of rework-- with him on horse.    (I will pitch this)

I had this idea for a Jax rework

 what if Jax actually displayed his prowess with different weapons and his aptitude for his namesake(Grandmaster at Arms) by actually cycling through several different weapons including his traditional lamppost?

The pitch being that  what if Jax was a wandering warrior who collected a legendary memento weapon from each region he visited so he has a Ionian,Shuriman,Freljordian and Demacian weapon but relegates himself to using his trusty lamppost to keep things interesting.

Jax is a Grandmaster at arms because he's versed in all forms of weapon combat. in terms of gameplay im not really sure how it could work. Maybe give Jax a new ultimate that lets him Pick-A-Weapon (like {{champion:4}} ) and use that for the next whatever seconds before he trades it back in for ol Lampy.

Kinda like this dude from Final Fantasy! http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/finalfantasy/images/b/b3/FF5_Gilgamesh.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20120716023940

Winged Hussar honestly really needs to yell ''THEN THE WINGED HUSSARS ARRIVED'' whenever he jumps in.

For reasons.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=75zmIj_4LFQ

Yes. More cavalry. 

Hell I'll take anything inspired by historical soldiers. Right now we have Xin, Pantheon, and Olaf. And Pantheons going to be turned into some lame space god thing. 

Some mounted Chinese cavalry, legionnaires, the Varangian guard, an actual knight. 

There are so many things to draw from. And instead we have like 4 ninjas.

i think jarvan should get a horse

*Edit*

and here's why

-----




if i were to make jarvan i would first change his weird interactions with the game that make him look like he's stretch armstrong.

then i would combine his R and his E and give him an animation where he slams the flag down and it causes the ground to erupt around him in a slighly larger than current area.

lances are literally never used without a mount because they're not great for throwing and they're too large for repetitive thrusting and so the fact that jarvan doesnt have a mount makes me a bit sad - perhaps it's supposed to be a pike or a javelin?

jarvan needs a horse.

he'd ride atop a mighty stead into battle as a tank/fighter.

he'd wield a mighty lance and a shield which he'd use the shield (regular) and the horses body (criticals) for basic attacking and on his back he'd have a huge banner for demacia.

his passive would be that his banner grants an aura called morale.

he'd use one ability to thrust his lance.

another ability would allow his horse to leap to a location like sejauni's boar but more graceful and with a different effect.

he'd have an ability that raises his shield and gets a movement speed boost.

his R would throw down his giant banner at his horses side and cause the earth to shatter in a ring around him granting buffs and debuffs all around the arena. "he'd shout THIS LAND IS NOW OWNED BY DEMACIA! or something...

besides that demacia needs a mounted unit. noxus, shadow isle, freljord, etc. have mounted units.

I say give em both their own respective horses
Heck, make them inter-actable even
sounds good to me. they can be hussars

Well he is on the list for a VGU,so he might get a horse when that comes around.
Though the question would be how it'd be included in his kit,because I really doubt that it'd be permanent,it would most likely be an out-of-combat speed boost.
omg that would be bad ass

aaaaaaaaaaaaand morderkaiser rides a dead horse?
one of the 4 horsemen of the apocalypse?
If he ever gets a redesign, he could make for an interesting perma-speed boost/toggle mounted hero perhaps. Donno though.
